title: Purse Seining: a new Australian fishery
brief_description: The film refers to and shows some of the aerial and sea surveys of the pelagic fish resources off the Australian Coast, undertaken bby the Divsion of Fisheries, CSIRO. Describes in detail the use of the purse-seine net in catching mackerel off the Tasmanian coast.
